item.description: This article is incomplete! If you’re reading this, you’re probably not allowed to >:( Low-Cost Tracking Challenge In a recent Hak5 episode, I took part in a challenge to track our elusive friend, Irish, and determine the various places he visited throughout the day. Since low-cost hardware & disposable signals intelligence is a core part of my projects, I challenged myself to create a tracker in the smallest practical footprint, and designed a $10 device that uses only WiFi to provide location updates once planted on Irish’s car.
